description.p: ROS-Industrial support for the KUKA KR 300 R2500 ultra.
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for KUKA KR 300 R2500 ultra manipulators.
Joint limits and maximum joint velocities hasn't been validated.
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.
